name: AlterPage
description:
We are AlterPage - An interactive agency
Our company specializes in creating tailored solutions such as partnership programmes, mobile applications or 3D wizards. We deliver original proprietary solutions for the e-commerce environment through dedicated online stores and e-magazines, created as an answer to the special needs of our clients. We are aware that each project has its own rights and requires special attention.
Understanding the needs
In order to fully understand your needs, for at least a moment we have to become just as you. To achieve this we simply… listen. We want you to tell us about your expectations and aims. We want to get to know your present and potential clients and how you would like to communicate with them. In our work we focus on personal interactions and relations. 
Planning
Thanks to a motivated team of professionals, we effectively combine our actions in many dimensions. Thanks to this, we have the possibility of looking at the project from many different angles. During our planning stage we clarify all of the targets as also all of your needs, making sure that all details are being taken care of. Based on the gathered information we create mockups, which present the project’s functionality in a clear way.
Development 
It is time for programming! During the development we implement all of the functional objectives of the project (application, portal, website). Login and registration module, automatic invoice issuing on an e-commerce platform, video streaming, development of many language versions of the page we will prepare anything you need.
